channel.description: Recent content in podcast on ebullient·works

item.title: airhacks.fm: MicroProfile Metrics, Micrometer and Quarkus — podcast with Adam Bien
item.description: I thoroughly enjoy talking with Adam. We sat down awhile ago to talk about metrics: who needs them, what they are for.. and some other things.

item.title: SpringOne 2019 Preview: Metrics for the Win
item.description: Mark is one of my favorite humans. It is always lovely to talk with him. Mark Heckler talks with Erin Schnabel about her SpringOnePlatform talk: Metrics for the Win: Using Micrometer to Understand Application Behavior. Schnabel, E. (2019, September 5). Using Micrometer to Understand Application Behavior, a SpringOne Platform preview (M. Heckler, Interviewer) [Interview]. In Tanzu Talk (formerly Pivotal Conversations). https://soundcloud.com/pivotalconversations/using-micrometer-to-understand-application-behavior

item.title: airhacks.fm: Java EE ebullience — podcast with Adam Bien
item.description:
I spent an excellent few hours recording a podcast with Adam Bien.

CORBA? OpenLiberty? Robots? The glory days of object marshaling? Such a trip down memory lane! We could easily have talked for another hour.

Can you hear my rings clinking on my favorite mug? Yes, yes you can.

Give it a listen:
